title: I'am so ready for Akali, hope to see a teaser for her this week
body:
Yep I know what you're thinking, " Aatrox is in the PBE and hasn't been come out yet and you're wanting to see Akali now? not gonna happen dude" but lemme tell you this too. Last year Kayn was still in the PBE and walla we see an Urgot's teaser. This is just an example of a back to back reveal patch and we all know that Riot doesn't have a clear schedule/pattern in releasing these stuff. They even release Shen VGU and Jhin together in the past so its not impossible.

Maybe Aatrox is just an appetizer and Akali is the main dish. Not to mention that Aatrox was just a huge GU in the past until they promote him into a VGU. 

BTW, Xin Zhao's GU was an anticipated GU too (but not heavy) and was a back to back patch with evelynn last year :)



ᴹᵃʸᵇᵉ ᴬᵏᵃᶫᶦ'ˢ ⱽᴳᵁ ᶦˢ ᴿᴵᴼᵀˢ ᵍᵃᵗᵉ ᵃʷᵃʸ ᵗᵒ ᵃᶫᶫ ᵗʰᵒˢᵉ ᴬᵃᵗʳᵒˣ ʰᵃᵗᵉ ᵃᶰᵈ ᶦᶠ ᵗʰᵉʸ ʳᵉᶫᵉᵃˢᵉ ʰᵉʳ ᵃᶠᵗᵉʳ ᵃᵃᵗʳᵒˣ'ˢ ᵖᵃᵗᶜʰ, ᶦᵗˢ ᶫᶦᵏᵉ ᶰᵒᵗʰᶦᶰᵍ ᵉᵛᵉᶰ ʰᵃᵖᵖᵉᶰ⋅ ᴶᵒᵏᵉ

replies.body:
i think that we will get a new champion first and then {{champion:84}} 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

nope buddy, Akali is next baby! says riot reav3 ;)


FUN FACT: After Akali is Nunu's turn then next is a new champ followed by a VGU
You sure? I don’t remember them confirming nunu being the next new release after Akali
They confirmed it a while ago during a champ roadmap.
Roadmap doesnt say that. Nunu is the next VGU but not confirmed to be the next release

Pretty sure the schedule is champ > vgu > vgu > champ > etc

so after Akali it should be a new champ then Nunu. Not 100% certain tho, should be more clear in the future.

Schedule so far has been Irelia > Pyke > Aatrox, and should continue as, Akali > new champ > Nunu

Wasnt it Swain - Irelia - Pyke - Aatrox?  That would support the next thing being Akali.

Or did KaiSa come between Swain and Irelia?

Oh i misunderstood what you said.  Just ignore me lol.

(Though u may or may not know they said they wanted to slow down new champ releases)

> [{quoted}](name=JonnyBoyy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=58Mv4XaE,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-06-20T11:46:55.053+0000)
>
>  Last year Kayn was still in the PBE and walla we see an Urgot&#039;s teaser. 

voila*
took my like 5 min to figure out what he was trying to say. XD
I think akali steps out of the shadows end of july probably. They usually leave one patch without new releases. But nevertheless I'm excited. Akali's thematic is super cool. :)

> [{quoted}](name=JonnyBoyy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=58Mv4XaE,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-06-20T11:46:55.053+0000)
>
> Last year Kayn was still in the PBE and walla we see an Urgot's teaser.

Wait a minute...
> [{quoted}](name=JonnyBoyy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=58Mv4XaE,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-06-20T11:46:55.053+0000)
>
> _walla_

I consider Aatrox the main dish.
A meaty, medium-rare steak, juicy and bloody.

Akali would be the dessert, though I don't know the flavor yet.

Maybe lol but I can see her and Aatrox as a back to back release.


BTW, if Akali would be the dessert, I think she is a rain drop cake like her shroud lol

Can't wait to see how many dashes and CCs she has...

{{sticker:sg-janna}}
Dear God yes she can keep her shroud just please no more infinite dashes

> [{quoted}](name=Valor Bot,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=58Mv4XaE,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-06-21T17:53:05.039+0000)
>
> Dear God yes she can keep her shroud just please no more infinite dashes

[Yes](https://media.giphy.com/media/S3Ot3hZ5bcy8o/giphy.gif)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Yeah i think Akali will either be in the next patch or the one after that.

And with Aatrox being a smaller update,there is a chance that Akali is in the following update(also I think they would have delayed the god skins to the next patch if the next patch just had a bunch of skins and no major release).
